overview: At home on their mountain, the small colony of rats doesn't lead much of a life. Nothing to eat, nothing to drink and nothing but rubbish, as far as the eye can see. Life drifts along, until one day a rat finds a postcard with a special motif. After this, nothing is the way it used to be ...
tagline: The circumstances for the little rat crowd are not very good. No food, nothing to drink and garbage everywhere. Once a rat finds a card everything will change.
title: Terminal: Paradise
